title: Pulled pork with cinnamon and clove
description: The Goan version of pulled pork is a meal for times of celebration. Serve it in lettuce cups with spicy coleslaw.
ingredients: 2kg/4lb 8oz rolled pork loin or shoulder or collar
Little Gem lettuce leaves, cleaned and well drained, to serve
1 tbsp broken pieces cinnamon or cassia bark
5cm/2in piece fresh root ginger, roughly chopped
100ml/3½fl oz palm vinegar or cider vinegar
